hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of time.
